text: Ansel Elgort (born March 14, 1994) is an American actor, singer and DJ. As an actor, he is best known for playing Tommy Ross in Carrie (2013), Caleb Prior in Divergent (2014), Augustus Waters in The Fault in Our Stars (2014) and Baby / Miles in Baby Driver (2017). As a musician, he is known by his stage name Ans√∏lo. Elgort was born in New York City, New York. His father is Arthur Elgort, a photographer who has worked for Vogue. His mother is Grethe Barrett Holby, an opera director. He has Russian Jewish, English, German and Norwegian ancestry. He has been dating his girlfriend, Violetta Komyshan, since high school. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official music site * * Category:1994 births Category:Actors from Manhattan Category:American DJs Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Living people Category:Models from Manhattan Category:Musicians from Manhattan
title: Ansel Elgort
